name: Zoho Integration for WordPress
author: Smackcoders

sections.description:
Unlock the power of Zoho Integration for WordPress, your ultimate solution for capturing leads and streamlining user registration seamlessly. This advanced plugin connects your WordPress website with Zoho CRM, ensuring effortless lead generation and contact management.

Key Features:

  • Effortless Integration: Say goodbye to manual work and coding. Zoho Integration for WordPress simplifies the integration process.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive interface makes setup a breeze, no HTML knowledge required.
  • Endless Customization: Create, add, and edit fields at any time to tailor your forms to your exact needs.
  • Dynamic Form Generation: Generate web forms on the fly, capturing your website’s visitors as high-potential leads in Zoho CRM.
  • Shortcode Integration: Seamlessly embed forms with a shortcode, enhancing user engagement.
  • Fetch Zoho CRM Fields: Fetch CRM Zoho lead fields directly into WordPress to create a customized form.
  • Field Customization: Enable/disable fields to include in the form or not, ensuring complete control.
  • Widget Integration: Use a separate shortcode to integrate forms as widgets site-wide, expanding your reach.
  • Sync WP Members: Capture and sync newly registered WP members to Zoho CRM contacts, ensuring a centralized database for your leads.
  • Part of WP Leads Builder for Any CRM: Zoho Integration is now part of the powerful WP Leads Builder For Any CRM, offering even more features and CRM integrations.

Elevate your lead generation game with Zoho Integration for WordPress – the all-in-one solution for capturing, managing, and nurturing leads effortlessly. Unleash the true potential of your WordPress website today.

To upgrade for Leads Builder For CRM Pro

Other Useful Plugins & Addons By Smackcoders

To Import and Export WordPress Data as CSV or XML
and for premium version of the plugin, you can get it here

The Leads Builder for WordPress to capture your webforms as leads to one of the top ranking open source CRM, install the WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM Plugin. Install one of the CRM of your choice with the additional add-ons listed below and keep both parent plugin and CRM addon activated.
* Salesforce
* Freshsales
* Vtiger CRM

To know more about the premium bundled version, visit WordPress Lead Form Data Collection to CRM with unlimited features
sections.installation:
1. First, install CRM WordPress Leads
  2. Then Extract the wp-zoho-crm.zip in wordpress/wp-content/plugins using FTP or through plugin install in wp-admin.
  3. Activate the plugin in the WordPress plugin list.
sections.faq:
1) How to create form with Contact Form 7?

  • Enable the Contact Form 7 in CRM configuration under Form Type.
  • In CRM Forms menu select the required fields and Save.
  • The shortcode with selected fields created in Contact Form 7.
  • Place the shortcode in Post, Page or Widget.

2) Why I’m not able to submit the form created with Contact form?

  • After generating the shortcode for Contact form.
  • Go to Contact â†’ Contact Forms â†’ Edit view of the shortcode.
  • In Mail menu, configure all the settings and save.
  • If the mail is not configured the form will trigger an error message stating ‘Submission failed’.

2.1.1

  • Resolved : Missing assets

  • Checked: Compatibility for WordPress 6.3.2
  • Updated: Latest Zoho CRM API

  • Added: Edit Option for Thirdparty forms

  • Checked: WordPress 5.7 Compatibility

  • Added : Zoho CRM Domain Support(zoho.com,zoho.au,zoho.eu,zoho.in)

1.4.6

  • Modified: Activated addon slug.

1.4.5

  • Added: WP CSRF Protection.

1.4.4

  • Added: Sync WordPress users as Leads into the Zoho CRM.
  • Added: Leads Builder Pro Banner.

1.4.3

  • Added: Compatibility for WordPress 5.3.2

1.4.2

  • WordPress 5.0.3 compatibility
  • Fixed security issue by adding missing validation on TLS Connections.

1.4.1

  • WordPress 5.0.2 Compatibility
  • ZOHO CRM API version 2 Compatibility

1.4

  • WordPress 4.8.1 compatibility tested.
  • Smooth auto migration script Removed
  • Added a addon support

1.3

  • WordPress 4.8 compatibility tested.
  • Smooth auto migration script added to get new wp-leads-builder-for-any-crm installed

1.2

  • WordPress 4.5 compatibility was checked.
  • Migration script added to get new wp-leads-builder-for-any-crm

1.1.11

  • Features moved to new combined plugin Leads Builder For Any CRM
  • Added: Debug mode enable/disable options.
  • Modified: Menu order changes.

1.1.1

  • Improved UI for better usability
  • Compatible with 3..9.1 and php 5.4
  • Warnings and minor bug fixes
  • Improved authentication error on authtokens

1.0.0

  • This is the basic version. Tested and found works well without any issues.
